entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
